verses.name: 1 Kings 4:24
verses.text: For he had dominion over all the region on this side the river, from Tiphsah even to Azzah, over all the kings on this side the river: and he had peace on all sides round about him.

verses.name: 1 Kings 4:25
verses.text: And Judah and Israel dwelt safely, every man under his vine and under his fig tree, from Dan even to Beer–sheba, all the days of Solomon.

verses.name: 1 Kings 4:26
verses.text: And Solomon had forty thousand stalls of horses for his chariots, and twelve thousand horsemen.
